## Orientation

plot this

```{r, warning = F, message = F}
library(tidyverse)

mtcars %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = qsec, y = drat)) +
  geom_point()
```

Here are the `Orange` data.

```{r}
Orange %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = age, y = circumference, colour = Tree)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  guides(colour = FALSE) +
  xlim(0, NA) +
  theme_bw()
```

I hope this renders.
